dmca.title: Google DMCA - Fischinger
dmca.body:
Elfriede Fischinger Trust

January 4, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Bayshore Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

1.	The copyrighted works at issue are the films of Oskar Fischinger.

2.	Search Query: Oskar Fischinger + P2P
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.download-finished.com and
www.download-finished.com/p2p/downloads?order=percent
both have a Short Animation by Oskar Fischinger for download

www.download-finished.com/p2p/downloads?order=eta

www.download-finished.com/archive/oskar-fischinger-the-contemplative-films-of-oskar-fischinger-fitzavi.html (this one is a download of a copyrighted videotape containing many films by Fischinger)

https://www.download-finished.com/p2p/downloads?order=eta
(this one has downloads of Studie nr 7, Wax Experiments, Kreise and a "short animation" by Oskar Fischinger

www.download-finished.com/archive/oskar-fischinger-allegretto-1936-dvdrip-xvid-cine magrotesqueavi.html

www.download-finished.com/archive/oskarfischinger-motionpaintingno11942dvdripxvid-cinemagrotesqueavi.html

www.download-finished.com/___/finished-films/page/3/

www.download-finished.com/___/finished-films/page/16

These infringers have even posted our letter asking for removal of our copyrighted files, at www.download-finished.com/fan-mail

3. My Contact Information: fischingerarchive@msn.com

4. Infringer's Contact Information: Sven Konig and !Bitnik Media Collective. Only contact info available is: sales@popmodernism.biz and http://www.popmodernism.org/

5. The use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Please notify us that these urls have been removed from all Google search engines. 

Sincerely,

Barbara Fischinger, Trustee
Elfriede Fischinger Trust
562-496-1449
fischingerarchive@msn.com


Elfriede Fischinger Trust

January 4, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
2400 Bayshore Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

Please notify us that these urls have been removed from all Google search engines. 

Sincerely,
